==Translingual==

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|mul|畞}} (original character)
* {{l|mul|亩}} (Simplified Chinese)
* {{l|mul|畒}}, {{l|mul|畆}}, {{l|mul|畮}} (variants)

===Etymology===
The original character is [[畞]]. [[田]] + [[十]] (measure ten paces) + [[久]] (huncing walk)

===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=102|rad=田|as=05|sn=10|four=07680|canj=YWNO|ids=⿰亩久}}

# Chinese land measure, [[mu]]. Eg, In Zhou (周) period, 100 [[步]] = 1.8 are. and 1 acre equaling approximately 6.07 mu
# [[field]]s
# [[ridge]], [[furrow]]
